title: Thibaut Pinot, the ‘chosen one’ who made France dream
content:
As the popular climber races his final Tour de France, we explore Pinot's bittersweet sporting trajectory of 'death and resurrection', and how he enchanted a nation.

Read the full article at Thibaut Pinot, the ‘chosen one’ who made France dream on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
